languages.text: "Мне доводилось читать о пылающих мирах сектора Пандоры. Говорят, они неведомым образом полыхают вот уже около века. Сколько же горит этот?"

traits.locale_text: "Мне доводилось читать о пылающих мирах сектора Пандоры. Говорят, они неведомым образом полыхают вот уже около века. Сколько же горит этот?"

languages.text: "I happen to have read about burning worlds in Pandora. It is said the fires there have been raging for close to a century, though no one knows how. How long has this one been burning?"
languages.original_text: "Мне доводилось читать о пылающих мирах сектора Пандоры. Говорят, они неведомым образом полыхают вот уже около века. Сколько же горит этот?"

traits.locale_text: "I happen to have read about burning worlds in Pandora. It is said the fires there have been raging for close to a century, though no one knows how. How long has this one been burning?"
"I happen to have read about burning worlds in Pandora. It is said the fires there have been raging for close to a century, though no one knows how. How long has this one been burning?"
"I happen to have read about burning worlds in Pandora. It is said the fires there have been raging for close to a century, though no one knows how. How long has this one been burning?"
"I happen to have read about burning worlds in Pandora. It is said the fires there have been raging for close to a century, though no one knows how. How long has this one been burning?"

languages.text: « J'ai déjà lu des récits décrivant les mondes brûlants de Pandora. On dit que les incendies y font rage depuis près d'un siècle, même si nul n'en connaît la cause. Depuis combien de temps celui-ci brûle-t-il ? »
languages.original_text: "I happen to have read about burning worlds in Pandora. It is said the fires there have been raging for close to a century, though no one knows how. How long has this one been burning?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai déjà lu des récits décrivant les mondes brûlants de Pandora. On dit que les incendies y font rage depuis près d'un siècle, même si nul n'en connaît la cause. Depuis combien de temps celui-ci brûle-t-il ? »

languages.text: “我碰巧读到过有关潘多拉燃烧世界的记载。据说，那里的大火已经肆虐了将近一个世纪，可没人知道它是怎么烧起来的。这里的大火已经烧了多久了？”
languages.original_text: "I happen to have read about burning worlds in Pandora. It is said the fires there have been raging for close to a century, though no one knows how. How long has this one been burning?"

traits.locale_text: “我碰巧读到过有关潘多拉燃烧群界的记载。据说，那里的大火已经肆虐了将近一个世纪，可没人知道它是怎么烧起来的。这里的大火已经烧了多久了？”

languages.text: 「パンドラでバーニングワールドの話を読んだことがあるわ。そこは、100年近く燃え続けていると言われている。でも、どうやって燃えているのかは誰にもわからない。いつから燃えているのかしらね？」
languages.original_text: "I happen to have read about burning worlds in Pandora. It is said the fires there have been raging for close to a century, though no one knows how. How long has this one been burning?"

traits.locale_text: 「パンドラでバーニングワールドの話を読んだことがあるわ。そこは、100年近く燃え続けていると言われている。でも、どうやって燃えているのかは誰にもわからない。いつから燃えているのかしらね？」

languages.text: "Ich habe zufällig etwas über brennende Welten in Pandora gelesen. Es heißt, dass die Feuer dort seit nahezu einem Jahrhundert toben, doch niemand weiß warum. Wie lange brennt dieses Feuer hier wohl schon?"
languages.original_text: "I happen to have read about burning worlds in Pandora. It is said the fires there have been raging for close to a century, though no one knows how. How long has this one been burning?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe zufällig etwas über brennende Welten in Pandora gelesen. Es heißt, dass die Feuer dort seit nahezu einem Jahrhundert toben, doch niemand weiß warum. Wie lange brennt dieses Feuer hier wohl schon?"

languages.text: «He leído algo sobre los mundos ardientes de Pandora. Dicen que las llamas llevan más de un siglo ardiendo, aunque nadie sabe cómo. ¿Cuánto lleva este ardiendo?».
languages.original_text: "I happen to have read about burning worlds in Pandora. It is said the fires there have been raging for close to a century, though no one knows how. How long has this one been burning?"

traits.locale_text: «He leído algo sobre los mundos ardientes de Pandora. Dicen que las llamas llevan más de un siglo ardiendo, aunque nadie sabe cómo. ¿Cuánto lleva este ardiendo?».

languages.text: "Pandora'daki yanan dünyaları okumuştum. Oradaki yangınların neredeyse bir asırdır sürdüğü söyleniyor, kimse nasılını bilmiyor. Peki bu dünya ne zamandır yanıyor?"
languages.original_text: "I happen to have read about burning worlds in Pandora. It is said the fires there have been raging for close to a century, though no one knows how. How long has this one been burning?"
